traits.name: Hardened Exterior
traits.desc: Bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage the corlapis takes from nonmagical weapons is reduced by 3 to a minimum of 1.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The corlapis's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: light, shape stone, stoneskin (self only)

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.desc: The corlapis has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks to hide in rocky terrain.

traits.name: Sturdy
traits.desc: The corlapis has advantage on saving throws against effects that would cause it to move or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The corlapis makes two attacks with its warhammer.

actions.name: Warhammer
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Hurl Boulder
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Stonework Prison (1/Day)
actions.desc: The corlapis summons a 10-foot diameter cage of stone at a point it can see within 90 feet. Each side of the cage has 15 hit points and AC 15. Any creature in the cage's area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, a creature is ejected from that space to the nearest unoccupied space outside of it. A Huge or larger creature succeeds on the saving throw automatically. On a failed save, a creature is trapped within the bars of the cage. The bars are wide enough to allow projectiles to pass through it, but not melee weapons. The cage can hold a maximum of four Medium or smaller creatures or one Large creature.
